entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tracking issue on license/cla failures #67965
  • Improper emit of a ref assembly containing duplicate file local types #67962
    17.7
  • c#, if file name starts with "I" then interface should be created #67957
  • CodeLens constructor reference not working with target-typed new across projects #67956
  • await completion adds async to unrelated local function instead of the containing method declaration #67952

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33625.187 #67961
  • CodeFixProvider for diagnostics reported by IIncrementalGenerator #67354
  • High CPU usage in VBCSCompiler after update .NET 6 to .NET 7 #66895
  • `IAwaitOperation.Type` shouldn't be void for VB when await is bound as statement #67616
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Snap 17 7 #67968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • EnC refactoring: Align wrappers with contracts better #67967
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Update features/interceptors from main #67966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update configs for 17.7 p1 snap #67964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid rooting documents for languages that support syntax trees #67960
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed performance #67959
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing ref receiver temp #67955
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool `BindingDiagnosticBag`s #67954
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't provide CodeActionWithDialog if option service is null #67951
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Make EnC service a MEF service instead of a workspace service #67896
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Clear out data from pooled object before returning to pool #67963
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.7 P1
  • Move to non-segmented dictionary #67958
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, 17.7 P1
  • Allow code fixes for source generator diagnostics #67953
    Area-IDE, 17.7 P1
  • Fix a wrong text span usage in MergeIfStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider #67948
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.7 P1
  • Add import completion option to LSP #67947
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.7 P1
  • Hard code segment constants for common type sizes #67921
    Area-Compilers, 17.7 P1
  • Use non-void type for `BoundAwaitOperator` in VB statement #67822
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7 P1
  • Pool node collections in analyzer driver. #67776
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, 17.7 P1

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #67925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67969
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.0 release branch #67901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.2 release branch #67902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.4 release branch #67903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • EnC refactoring: ProjectBaseline, ProjectDiagnostics, PendingUpdate #67941
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Remove code lens cache to improve results returned #67884
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Share common code involved into building dictionaries of members for namespace symbols #67933
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not return file-local type requested by unmangled metadata name #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove ValueTuple workaround #67837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only pack the shipping/non-shipping nupkgs for roslyn #67679
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add FilterSpan API to analyzer contexts #67818
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Feedback on caching constructed Nullable<T> types #67807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid stack overflow due to deep recursion on long chain of calls. #67913
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • Make scripting work in single-file deployments #57910
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
